The truth is no one knows.

1021142867048378368.text: The token can be freely traded on exchanges it could rise in value with increased demand from use of the application. Hence the term “Better-than-free” business model.pic.twitter.com/uAnK9QEGOS

1021097572650319873.text: What good is the token if the centrally controlled platform is closed or the token removed from the platform?pic.twitter.com/uh1RuKnWAQ

1021022082010951680.text: The token itself as credit issued on Blockchain based private/public key pairs does not require trust, but the platform in which it is built in does.pic.twitter.com/LCmzhOB68Y

1020780483129552896.text: While the token is transferable via the ethereum/bitcoin blockchain and tradable on exchanges, they’re build into centrally controlled platforms and as such require trust in 3rd parties.pic.twitter.com/7H6YbChdcd

1020735181559353345.text: Is the token a native part of a closed source privately owned platform? This business model is leveraging the technology of Bitcoin, Ethereum and other blockchain based protocols.pic.twitter.com/O0X0x0xJyA

1020641986666287106.text: The levels of decentralization in these open source projects varies. Protocol development often starts out centralized, with goals of becoming decentralized.pic.twitter.com/J8SnoY4Kwk

1019643413224927232.text: Low Friction on Participation -> Better Stakeholders!pic.twitter.com/asSifN4ZAO

1019567972615098369.text: Light regulation and worldwide availability minimizes friction on participation for relevant parties worldwide. Al else being equal, the protocols are more likely than its business/equity counterparts to attract the right stakeholders and talent.pic.twitter.com/TfMAj54tcM

1019205447973208064.text: Founding and Funding Decentralized: Tokens can launch in any country and the core developer team does not need to go to Silicon Valley or other tech hubs for funding. It all goes down online through token sales. Likewise, the team can be spread across the world.pic.twitter.com/hsGIHk6c45

1018993890068697089.text: The commitment of Key Partners can be secured and incentivized by token ownershippic.twitter.com/GHRJJePehi

1018918521143689218.text: In Decentralized Business Models, the term “Stakeholders” might be more appropriate than “Key Partners”. Stakeholders are clearly defined by token ownership.pic.twitter.com/RoKRNVBZYo

1018842944378429440.text: One of the main characteristics of the Decentralized Business Model is how it incentivizes all relevant stakeholders. How it aligns the interest of all stakeholders towards the success of the project.pic.twitter.com/skrW9oWGBS

1018620007415209990.text:
How can investors protect themselves?
They can keep digital tokens away from exchanges and store them offline, in what’s known as cold storage.pic.twitter.com/RnmmiGc96n

1018242520201998343.text: We created seriesOne to unchain financing to support new businesses. Start-ups and young businesses are the engine of innovation and job creation, yet banks and venture capitalists only fund a small percentage of those that are deserving, until now.pic.twitter.com/i9nx122WNd

1018197238290571270.text: Your company was backed by a group of investors because they share in your vision and believe you are going to be successful.pic.twitter.com/D7lQMXhIkN
